testcase.classname: Adding Food Items to the Cart by Searching Food Item
testcase.name: Check whether user is able to search a food item and add it to the cart

failure.message: Not able to add the dish to the cart, please check it once expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
Given Swiggy Application is Up and Running..................................passed When User enters and select the desired location from "placeOrderBySearchingDish" and 0.passed Then User should be navigated to restaurants page with the url "https://www.swiggy.com/restaurants".passed When User clicks Search Link................................................passed Then System should show Search For Restaurants or Dishes Search Box.........passed When User enters the dish name based on value from "placeOrderBySearchingDish" and 0.passed Then System should show the list of options related to the dish entered.....passed When User chooses the desired dish based on value from "placeOrderBySearchingDish" and 0.passed Then System should show all the available dish items related to the desired dish to the user.passed When User adding the actual food items to the cart based on value from "placeOrderBySearchingDish" and 0.failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Not able to add the dish to the cart, please check it once expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:99) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1037) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:45) at com.swiggy.steps.PlaceOrderBySearchingDish.user_adding_the_actual_food_items_to_the_cart_based_on_value_from_and(PlaceOrderBySearchingDish.java:119) at ✽.User adding the actual food items to the cart based on value from "placeOrderBySearchingDish" and 0(file:///D:/lms-workspace/SwiggyCucumber/src/test/resources/features/placeOrderBySearchingDish.feature:13)
